Label
Field		 Infolet (Filter) Description

Document ID
DO_ID

This field captures the unique document id

Document Category
DO_CATEGORY

MS_AUD_MSNPI_Get_LOV_Details
(Document Categories) 		This field is used to categorize this document. This is enabled for both the document types

Comments
DO_COMMENTS

This attribute captures the comments provided while uploading the doc

Select Document
DO_DOCUMENT

This field is enabled only when the Document Type selected is Uploaded and the user can upload a document from his system

Link
DO_LINK

This field captures the link of the uploaded doc

Document Name
DO_NAME

This field shows the document name. In the case of Uploaded Documents, this field is directly editable. In the case of Managed documents, this field automatically assumes the document name as selected from a managed document system like DMS. The user clicks on a link or icon next to the Document Name to select the document from DMS or the external system. Once a document is populated, a download link to get the document must also be available. Note that Document Name text field cannot take free-text in the case of managed documents.

Type
DO_TYPE

MS_AUD_MSNPI_Get_LOV_Details
(Document Type) 		This field contains value, either uploaded or managed .If Uploaded the user will directly upload a file from his system. By default, Uploaded is selected. If Managed- This value describes that this is a managed document in DMS

This field displays value while reassigning final approver and the below conditions satisfies . If Approvals Required is equal to By Lead Auditor and Audit Manager this field is visible and disabled. The Audit Managers name is populated in read-only mode. When Audit Classification is equal to Cross Functional the value is Any Approver this field is visible and editable. The task creator can select any approver who has the activity AUD - Approve tasks

By default the Lead Auditor is selected Auditors Task owners and Approvers can add actions during fieldwork Lead auditor Audit Managers and Lead Auditor can add actions using the Draft Issue stage Auditee can add actions while responding to issues sent for review Auditee can edit actions Auditee can edit delete actions defined by the lead auditor and auditor

(Task Owner) 		This field is Auto-populated from Create Task form

Reviewer
TASK_REVIEWER

MS_AUD_Org_Users
(Task Reviewer) 		This field is visible only if the action is Send for Review and the task owner can send the task form to anyone with the activity AUD Review tasks in the system Note: The list of reviewers displayed will be based on the Restrict Access To field defined in the Audit form If restrict Access to is equal to no restriction, user can be at the system level If restrict access to is equal to Org, then the reviewer will be filtered based on the Conducted By (Org) If restrict access to is equal to within team, the reviewers will be filtered based on the team

Approved- When the draft report is approved by the approver. Pending Management Support Review - When the issues are sent to management support. Audit Title
AUDIT_TITLE

This field is used to to specify the title of the audit.

Audit Type
AUDIT_TYPE

MS_AUD_AUDIT_Dependent_List_details This field displays the value of the possible audit types. This field depends on the selected Audit Classification. If the Audit Classification is Compliance then the default values are Financial, Operations, Regulatory, Environmental, Health and Safety and SOX. If the Audit Classification is Cross Functional, then the default values here are Financial, Operations, Regulatory, Environmental, Health and Safety and SOX. If the Audit Classification is Quality, then the default values here are Process, Product and System. If the Audit Classification is Internal, then the default values here are Compliance, Financial, Investigation, IT/IS, Management, Operational, Performance and Tax. If the Audit Classification is Operational, then the default values here are Third Party, EHS, Labor, Product, Quality and Sustainability. If the Audit Classification is Integrated, then the default values here are Environmental, Financial, Health and Safety, Operations, Regulatory and SOX.

Schedule End Date
SCHEDULE_END_DATE

This is visible and applicable only when the audit recurrence is not non-recurring. The value in this field describes the date at which this schedule project becomes inactive. Only future dates past the schedule start date can be set here. If the user is submitting the form without providing an end date, system gives a message to alert the user. However, the system will allow the user to submit the form without end date.

This field is Deprecated in current release

SCHEDULE_START_DATE

This is visible and applicable only when the audit recurrence is not non-recurring. The value in this field describes the date at which this schedule project becomes active. Any date (including past dates) can be set here. This is defaulted to the current system date.

TS_TASK_APPROVER

If Approvals Required = By Lead Auditor, this field is displayed in read-only mode with the Lead Auditors name. When the task owner sends this form for approval, the form sent to the Lead Auditor of the audit for approval If Approvals Required = By Lead Auditor and Audit Manager, then this field is displayed in read-only mode and the lead auditors name is displayed and the final approver field is visible in read-only mode If Approvals Required = By Any Approver the task creator can select any approver who has the activity AUD - Approve tasks who will approve the task. When Audit Classification = Cross Functional the value is Any Approver there will be 2 levels of approval where the task creator can select any approver who has the activity AUD - Approve tasks the Task Approver being mandatory the Final Approver being optional.

The task creator can select any approver who has the activity AUD - Approve tasks

Following values are auto-populated based on the stage Pending Task Review when the task is sent for review. This will not be displayed in the Draft Issue form Pending Task Approval when the task is sent for approval. This will not be displayed in the Draft Issue form Draft when the task is approved Pending Internal Review when issue is sent for internal review Internal Review Completed when internal review is completed Pending Auditee Review when issue is sent for external review Auditee Review Completed when external review is completed Pending Lead Auditor Review when the internal external review form is sent back to the Lead Auditor for review Draft Report Pending Auditee Review when issue is sent for external review in the draft report Draft Report Pending Internal Review when issue is sent for internal review in the draft report Draft Report Request Clarification - When the Approver Requests for clarification in the Draft Audit Report Draft Report Pending Approval - when the draft report is sent for approval. Approved- When the draft report is approved by the approver. Pending Management Support Review - When the issues are sent to management support. Request Clarification - When the management support requests for clarification Report Issued when issue is included as part of report and the report is issued
